metadata.title: CVE-2014-1868 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Restlet Framework 2.1.x before 2.1.7 and 2.x.x before 2.2 RC1, when usingXMLRepresentation or XML serializers, allows attackers to cause a denial ofservice via an XML Entity Expansion (XEE) attack.

criterions.comment: restlet: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
